title: HOUR 1- Bruce Arians Oct 21, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Bruce Arians Oct 21, 2020
description:
Tampa Bay Head Coach Bruce Arians and Dan reflect on Bruce's running ability as a QB while in college. Bruce tells Dan that he and Gronk get along well although he some times wonders if Gronk's elevator goes all the way to the top. Coach says he likes when Tom Brady gets on players because then he doesn't have to do it himself.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
